Address.value: 1900 RESTON METRO PLAZA,10TH FLOOR, RESTON, Virginia, 20190, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Comstock Holding Co Inc is a developer and manager of mixed-use and transit-oriented properties with operations that are primarily focused in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area. It provides a broad range of asset management services to customers and partners, composed primarily of private and institutional owners, investors in commercial, residential, and mixed-use real estate, and various governmental bodies seeking to leverage the potential of public-private partnerships.
